description: Though the Shinma War has ended (the conflict reached a conclusion in approximately 4000 BK (before the Kouma War)), the overall conflict between shinzoku and mazoku has not. Before sinking into the Sea of Chaos, Ceifeed left behind four parts of himself, known as the Dragon Kings: Aqualord Ragradia, Firelord Vrabazard, Airlord Valwin, and Earthlord Rangort.
name: Aqualord Ragradia
